DOC.brief_title: Physical Therapy Quality Life Function Following Vaginal Surgery Reconstructive Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This single center randomize controlled trial assessing quality life participant follow vaginal surgery receive physical therapy compare standard postoperative care . Patients care physician Division Urogynecology Reconstructive Pelvic Surgery . All physician board certify , fellowship trained urogynecologists .
